message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have. Given its value, I'm offering it at a price of $14,000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is quite low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your response, Alice. I'm still looking to keep my expenses within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $12,500?
